Getting Started with SwarmForge

Learn how to build, deploy, and manage AI agent swarms.

Quick StartCore Concepts
5 Minutes

Quick Start

Get your first swarm running in three steps.

1

Create Account

Sign up for free and get instant access.

2

Choose Template

Browse pre-built templates or start fresh.

3

Deploy Swarm

Launch your agents and watch them work.

Fundamentals

Core Concepts

Swarms

A team of AI agents working together toward a goal.

Agents

Individual AI workers with specialized roles.

Tasks

What you want your swarm to accomplish.

Runs

A single execution of your swarm on a task.
